name: Grow your own Ghoul Girl
description:
THIS GAME WILL NOT BE UPDATED! Sorry, but this project has been dropped as we've gone our seperate ways and are busy with our own things. Thank you to all who play-tested this however, it was a blast working on this and we appreciate all feedback that was given.

A simple clicker game that allows you to grow your very own, adorable ghoul girl! With a variety of face, skin, hair and clothing variations and combinations, you can create unique ghouls to love and name your own!

This is the first build up for public play testing, so things are in need to polishing up & bugs may happen. Also, this is meant to be a very short but fun experience, additions such as possible in-game currency, mini-games & much more variety in clothing/hair have been discussed for an updated build.

If you have any problems, I urge you to comment below so we can fix them!

How to play:

  • Tap/click through 3 stages of growth: Egg, Toddler and Grown up!
  • Dress up your ghoul via the menu.
  • Reset the game entirely to get a new ghoul combination.

TIPS:

  • The clickable area is only on the egg/toddler/grown up ghoul.
  • If you seem to be getting repeating colours when resetting, try refreshing the window itself straight after resetting (for PC users), or resetting the app (for Android users).

Credits:

  • Coding: Jack Gill ( Twitter, SoGoodStudios )
  • Art: GHOULKISS ( Twitter, Patreon )
  • Music: Purple Planet
